Methods in ch.ethz.csb.youscope.server.microscopeaccess that throw MicroscopeLockedException
 boolean CameraInternal.continousSequenceAcquisitionPopNextImage(MicroscopeImageListener listener)
          Pops an image in the previously started continuous acquisition and sends it to the listener.
 void MicroscopeInternal.lockExclusiveWrite()
          Locks the microscope for a longer time (e.g. for the duration of a measurement), such that only the locker may acquire the write lock to the microscope.
 void MicroscopeInternal.lockWrite()
          Locks the microscope for a SHORT time (e.g. for the duration of changing the position), such that only the locker may acquire the write OR the read lock to the microscope.
